Hey, I'm Sander.

I design and develop digital products, web applications and websites. I work from my office in the heart of Breda, the Netherlands. I tweet here, write here and some of the projects I am (or used to be) proud of are down here. ⬇

  • Wordeys: Building the next-generation language learning app as Co-founder.
  • Broaap: Design and development on a route sharing platform for bikers.
  • Cribber: Complete design and front-end development.
  • Defty: concept, design and development as graduation project.
  • Mart Makelaardij: design and development as freelancer.
  • Pickle: interaction and visual design as student project.

Stay updated

Sign up to my email list to be the first to know about my writing and the products I launch. Ok kind sir

Tools

Tools are key. For design I use tools as Sketch, Figma, InVision, Marvel and the Adobe Suite. Depending on the needs of the project I can develop with technologies as HTML, CSS, Javascript (vanilla and frameworks like jQuery, React, Vue and Angular), Ruby on Rails, PHP, Gulp, Webpack, npm, SCSS and front-end frameworks like Bootstrap and Foundation. However, tools are just tools. Throw something fun at me.

Contact

I might be available for freelance work. If you've got a cool project, want to work together or just enjoy talking, send me an email at sander@sanderfish.nl or contact me on Twitter (@fishsander).
